Get the Actor to move

Add the line:
1. Click the play button. The Actor will move in a straight line and stop when it hits the edge.
Add the lines to get the Actor to turn with the direction keys:

1. run the game and don't press any keys - the Actor should move forward and will get stuck at the right edge.
  2. run the game and hold the left arrow key down - the Actor will move in an anti-clockwise circle.
  3. run the game and press the right arrow key - the Actor will move in a clockwise circle.
  4. run the game and use the right and left arrow keys to move the Actor.
